Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Account administration command, used to ban, unban, and slay (remove/delete) accounts. \\r\\n\\r\\nThe \\"ban\\" feature is used to ban an account. It requires a reason for the ban, and optionally allows you to express a period until the ban expires (e.g. \\"for 5 days\\" or \\"until Wednesday next week\\").\\r\\n\\r\\nThe \\"unban\\" feature is used to remove a permanent ban, or a temporary ban prior to its expiration. Unbanning accounts require that a reason is provided.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe \\"slay\\" feature is used to permanently and irreversibly delete an account. Obviously a command that should be considered carefully before used.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe +/-guide and +/-host commands are used to promote/demote a person, granting or revoking their privileges."

"+accadm ban zwoc for 1 week \\"He's a rude little dwarf.\\"\\r\\n Will ban the account Zwoc for 7 days (1 week).\\r\\n\\r\\n+accadm ban lucy \\"She is not welcome here anymore, because she stole my pink skirt.\\"\\r\\n Will ban the account Lucy permanently.\\r\\n\\r\\n+accadm unban lucy \\"She gave my pink skirt back.\\"\\r\\n Will remove the ban placed upon account Lucy.\\r\\n\\r\\n+accadm slay lucy\\r\\n Will remove the account Lucy permanently.\\r\\n\\r\\n+accadm +guide kalle\\r\\n Will make Kalle a guide.\\r\\n\\r\\n+accadm -guide kalle\\r\\n Will remove Kalle's guide privileges.\\r\\n\\r\\n+accadm +host kalle\\r\\n Will make Kalle a host.\\r\\n\\r\\n+accadm -host kalle\\r\\n Will remove Kalle's host powers.\\r\\n"
